name: The World Hopping Knight
description:
Controls

Keyboard + Mouse :

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look/Select Menu
  • Space: Jump
  • Q: Switch World
  • Shift : Sprint

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Joystick: Move/Select Menu
  • Right Joystick: Look
  • A : Jump/Confirm Menu Selection
  • B : Switch World
  • Left Bumper/L1 : Sprint

Instructions

Collect the 4 key shards to open the chest

Credits

Olivier Alarie / MrGommi
